title: Higher latitude chain (Lat 58.3, Long 291.8), Ground-based Vector Magnetic Field at Kuujjuaq, Canada, 0.5 sec, THEMIS GBO network - V. Angelopoulos & C.T. Russell (UCB & UCLA Respectively, NASA NAS5-02099)

info.contact: V. Angelopoulos & C.T. Russell @ UCB & UCLA Respectively, NASA NAS5-02099

parameters.name: thg_mag_kuuj
parameters.description: Magnetic field B in HEZ vector components

parameters.name: thg_magh_kuuj
parameters.description: ---> H - Local magnetic North component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_kuuj']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thg_magd_kuuj
parameters.description: ---> E - Local magnetic East component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_kuuj']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thg_magz_kuuj
parameters.description: ---> Z - Local vertical down component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_kuuj']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
